arguments.template:
<!-- 
  if slot isn't overwritten, we display the the default coponent, which is the 
  children passed onto this component.
-->
<ng-content *ngIf="!isOverriden"></ng-content>

<!-- If slot is overwritten, we render that instead. -->
<ng-container
  *ngIf="isOverriden"
  [ngTemplateOutlet]="overridingComponent"
  [ngTemplateOutletContext]="context"
></ng-container>

<ng-container *ngFor="let formField of formFields">
  <amplify-form-field
    [name]="formField[0]"
    [formField]="formField[1]"
  ></amplify-form-field>
</ng-container>
<ng-content></ng-content>
{{ errorMessage }}

{{ headerText }}

 {{ authenticator.error }}

{{ headerText }}

 {{ authenticator.error }}

{{ confirmSignUpHeading }}

{{ subtitleText }}
{{ authenticator.error }}

{{ this.headerText }}

 {{ authenticator.error }}

{{ this.headerText }}

 {{ authenticator.error }}
{{ translate(error) }}

{{ this.headerText }}

 {{ authenticator.error }}

{{ this.headerText }}

Loading...

{{ secretKey }}
{{ copyTextLabel }}
{{ authenticator.error }}
Sign in {{ authenticator.error }}
{{ authenticator.error }}
{{ tab.title }}

<label
  class="amplify-label"
  [class.amplify-visually-hidden]="labelHidden"
  [for]="fieldId"
>
  {{ label }}
</label>
<input
  class="amplify-input"
  [id]="fieldId"
  [type]="type"
  [name]="name"
  [placeholder]="placeholder"
  [required]="required"
  [value]="initialValue"
  [autocomplete]="autocomplete"
  [attr.disabled]="disabled ? '' : null"
  [attr.aria-invalid]="hasError ? 'true' : 'false'"
  [attr.aria-describedby]="describedBy"
/>

{{ this.headerText }}
{{ authenticator.error }}
